panels.title: RED Metric

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Request Count

targets.expr: sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{is_error="false", svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Request Success Rate

targets.expr: sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (svc_name, content_key) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/1000000

panels.title: Avg Response Latency

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

panels.title: Response Latency Percentiles

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_epoll_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_file_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_futex_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_cpu_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_runq_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_other_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

panels.title: Polaris Comprehensive Metrics

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange)) + histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_epoll_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))

panels.title: Quickly Determine If It's a Network Issue: Just Compare Application and Downstream Applications

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(kindling_profiling_runq_duration_nanoseconds_bucket{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval])) by (svc_name, content_key, vmrange))
sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_span_trace_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Quickly Determine If Container Specifications Need to Be Upgraded

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_cpu_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_cpu_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

targets.expr: sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_sum{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))/sum by (content_key, svc_name) (increase(kindling_profiling_net_duration_nanoseconds_count{svc_name=~"$service_name", content_key=~"$content_key", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))

panels.title: 90th Percentile File Read/Write Time Per Request

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
